body.name: Listerine Cool Mint Antiseptic Mouthwash, Daily Oral Rinse Kills 99% of Germs that Cause Bad Breath, Plaque and Gingivitis for a Fresher, Cleaner Mouth, Cool Mint Flavor, 1.5 L
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: KILLS 99% OF GERMS: 1.5-liter bottle of Listerine Cool Mint Antiseptic Mouthwash that kills 99.9% of germs that cause bad breath, plaque and gingivitis for a fresher and cleaner mouth than brushing alone

FIGHT PLAQUE AND GINGIVITIS: A germ-killing mouthwash clinically shown to reduce plaque more than brushing and flossing alone by up to 52 percent more and reduce gingivitis by 21 percent more, all while giving you fresh breath and germ protection
Destroys 5x more plaque above the gumline than floss!*

WHOLE MOUTH CLEAN: Get the germ-killing benefits from this oral rinse by rinsing full strength for 30 seconds with 20 mL both morning and night and feel the true fresh breath and deep clean effects from the refreshing mint-flavored mouthwash

REFRESHING MINT FLAVOR: From the #1 dentist recommended brand of over the counter mouthwashes, this mouthwash features a minty flavor that works to leave your mouth feeling clean and refreshed when used as part of a regular oral hygiene routine
body.description: Product Description Protect your mouth from germs and get fresh breath with the Listerine Cool Mint Antiseptic Mouthwash. Accepted by the American Dental Association (ADA), this germ-killing mouthwash for bad breath is clinically shown to reduce plaque 52 percent more and reduce gingivitis 21 percent more than brushing and flossing alone. Adding a 30-second rinse of this refreshing mint flavored oral rinse to your morning and evening oral hygiene routines is all it takes to get 24-hour germ protection against those that cause bad breath, plaque, and gingivitis. From the #1 dentist recommended brand** of over the counter mouthwashes, Listerine Cool Mint Antiseptic Mouthwash contains the antiplaque and antigingivitis ingredients eucalyptol, menthol, methyl salicylate and thymol. *Germ kill provides sustained plaque reduction after a dental cleaning. Rinse is not intended to replace brushing or flossing. Use product only as directed. *when used twice daily **IQVIA survey May 2022-2026 Amazon.com Fights Biofilm Germs that Brushing Leaves BehindDid you know that even after brushing, there are millions of stubborn germs left in your mouth? These germs build up and form a sticky layer called biofilm that covers every surface of your mouth, and can lead to the gum disease gingivitis. LISTERINE Antiseptic's triple-action formula penetrates biofilm, kills germs, and protects you from plaque and gingivitis for up to twelve hours.COOL MINTLISTERINE Fights Germs with Essential OilsThe power of LISTERINE Antiseptic comes from a formula of four essential oils that kill millions of germs on contact. LISTERINE's fixed combination of eucalyptol, menthol, methyl salicylate, and thymol continues to deliver unsurpassed results. No other branded mouthwash has this formula.What is Biofilm?Biofilm is a more recent term for the bacterial film on your teeth we call plaque. Biofilm is an organized community of germs in a gooey matrix that enables them to multiply and survive inside your mouth. Brushing and flossing help disrupt and remove this biofilm, but sometimes may miss hard to reach areas-prime real estate for gingivitis causing germs. LISTERINE Antiseptic rapidly penetrates the biofilm to kill plaque and gingivitis germs.LISTERINE ANTISEPTIC has Over 100 Years of Safe UseLISTERINE ANTISEPTIC was shown in a clinical study to reduce 52 percent more plaque and 21 percent more gingivitis than brushing and flossing alone. It is the only nationally branded antimicrobial mouthwash to receive the ADA Seal of Acceptance for fighting plaque and gingivitis. LISTERINE ANTISEPTIC has over 100 years of safe use and 50 years of research, making it the most widely used and extensively researched mouthwash in the U.S. "The ADA Council on Scientific Affairs' Acceptance of Listerine Antiseptic is based on its finding that the product is effective in helping to prevent and reduce gingivitis and plaque above the gumLine, when used as directed."A Whole-Mouth Clean is as Easy as 1-2-3You know the drill: 1) brush twice a day, 2) floss, and 3) rinse. But occasionally you forget some of these steps. You do many of the things you know are good for a healthy mouth, but you can do better. All it takes are small changes to your routine.Here are a few simple things you can do to get a healthier mouth:Replace your toothbrush every three or four months--sooner if the bristles are frayed. A worn toothbrush won't do as good a job of cleaning your teeth. Keep a few extra toothbrushes--like the REACH TOTAL CARE Multi-Action Toothbrush--on hand, so you can easily swap the old for the new.Visit your dentist twice a year for professional cleanings and oral exams. The more you go, the healthier your mouth will be--and those visits will seem less daunting.Maintain the healthy 1-2-3 oral-care routine: brush-floss-rinse. Make it a goal this week to brush and rinse twice in one day, and floss once. That extra 30 seconds of swishing, with a mouthwash like LISTERINE Antiseptic, will make your mouth so clean and healthy, you'll love the feeling and do it again the next day.The combination power of REACH and LISTERINE has been clinically proven to reduce gingivitis. If left untreated, gingivitis could progress to advanced gum disease, which emerging science suggests is associated with many other health problems. Use as directed.What's in the BoxLISTERINE COOL MINT Antiseptic Mouthwash, 1.5 LitersRecommended Combinations with LISTERINE Antiseptic Cool MintBrush with the REACH TOTAL CARE Toothbrush and floss withREACH TOTAL CARE Floss.Original:1 L (Pack of 3)Cool Mint:1.5 L500 mL (Pack of 4)Fresh Burst:1 L (Pack of 3)Soft Mint with Vanilla:1 L (Pack of 6)AdvancedArctic Mint:1 L (Pack of 6)1.5 L (Pack of 2)AdvancedNatural Citrus:1 L (Pack of 6) Trademark Information:LISTERINE® COOL MINT® REACH® MY TEETH, MY MOUTH, MY BODY™ A Whole Mouth Clean™ is as easy as 1. Brush 2. Floss & 3. Rinse™ END

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: LISTERINE ANTISEPTIC LISTERINE COOL MINT Antiseptic Mouthwash strikes fear into germs and delivers that feeling of whole mouth clean. Just 30 seconds of rinsing twice a day for clinically proven oral health benefits & 24-hour protection against germs that cause bad breath, plaque, and gingivitis. LISTERINE ANTISEPTIC LISTERINE COOL MINT Antiseptic Mouthwash strikes fear into germs and delivers that feeling of whole mouth clean. Just 30 seconds of rinsing twice a day for clinically proven oral health benefits & 24-hour protection against germs that cause bad breath, plaque, and gingivitis. LISTERINE ANTISEPTIC LISTERINE COOL MINT Antiseptic Mouthwash strikes fear into germs and delivers that feeling of whole mouth clean. Just 30 seconds of rinsing twice a day for clinically proven oral health benefits & 24-hour protection against germs that cause bad breath, plaque, and gingivitis.

GERMS WILL BEG FOR MERCY What happens each time you swish properly? LISTERINE COOL MINT Antiseptic Mouthwash fights 99.9% of germs that cause plaque and gingivitis. THE BOLDEST OF CLEANS Brushing and flossing only go so far. Adding rinsing with LISTERINE COOL MINT provides a greater reach for a whole mouth clean. PROTECT AGAINST GINGIVITIS A 30-second rinse, twice-daily with LISTERINE COOL MINT Antiseptic Mouthwash, gives 21% greater gingivitis reduction compared to brushing alone. #1 DENTIST RECOMMENDED BRAND Be sure to schedule appointments with your dentist at least every 6 months. Don’t be shy to ask your dentist/ hygienist about best oral care habits.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: If you want a mouthwash that will leave you with a fresh taste in your mouth, this is the one. Since I am relatively new with this product, not sure about the long term benefits but confident it will help the condition in my mouth.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars HAVE BEEN USING FOR YEARS, THIS IS THE BEST FLAVOR!
reviews.reviewText: I hope they never stop making this flavor, because it is by far the best flavor that Listerine makes. I am a religious listerine user, and swear that is helps with fresh breath and gingivitis. Amazon always has the best prices for this, much better than target or walmart.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for teeth health
reviews.reviewText: I use Listerine every day. After I brush in the morning and after I brush in the evening

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Product that hasn't changed and certanly gets the job done for fresh breath

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars August 2025 expiration; best practice is to use after eating, not after brushing
reviews.reviewText: 4/5 stars (removed one star because it's cheaper at Costco right now - this was a little over $8 with tax on Amazon, and Costco has a 2 pack for $10)It's Listerine, most everyone knows what it is - but what they might not have seen is dentists recommend not using mouthwash right after brushing because toothpaste and mouthwash cancel each other's fluoride concentrations out - instead, use mouthwash after eating sweets

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Autistic Daughter Can Use This Rather than Floss
reviews.reviewText: My adult daughter is mildly autistic. She has some dexterity problems, so she cannot use dental floss without harming her gums. Our dentist recommended that she use the Listerine Cool Mint a couple times each week to keep germs down without destroying all the good bacteria in her mouth. She uses a little medicine cup that we've saved from some other liquid medicine, to swish a small amount around in her mouth while she "sings" the Happy Birthday song in her mind, in order to swish it around long enough to do the job, then spits it out. She's been doing this for several years, and has had good results. So this is a helpful alternative for someone who cannot safely use dental floss.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Have used this mouthwash for years. Love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Delivery was very quick

reviews.reviewText: Looks all good arrived in good time thankyou

reviews.reviewTitle: Great mouthwash, but the price is unreasonable.
reviews.reviewText: This is my favorite mouthwash because it is not sweet. The alcohol kills bacteria, and makes my mouth feel clean. However, why is this not available for a normal price in Germany?
